price: Na mnapenda mali pendo la kupita kiasi.
footnotes: Na mnayapenda mali mno, yanayo kupelekeeni kupapatika katika kuyakusanya na ubakhili wa kuyatumia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
